en.accommodationProvided: We know you're travelling a long way, so we'd like to make sure you have somewhere to stay when you're here. Check out the link below for details on where you'll be staying.
en.browserCopy: You can also copy and paste this link in your browser's url bar.
en.canYouJoin: Please let us know if you're going to be able to join us on our special date, ${date_en}!
en.checkDetails: Why don't you check out a few details about the wedding?
en.linkForLogIn: Here is your link for quickly signing into ${process.env.NAME_1} and ${process.env.NAME_2}'s Wedding
en.linkSent: A link has been sent to you with instructions on logging in to the website
en.locationBlurb: The hotel is located in the lush suburbs of Budapest, in the hills of Buda.
en.lookingForward: We're looking forward to seeing you for our special day!
en.mustLogIn: You must log in to see this page.
en.name: Name
en.noSuchUser: Hmm, that email address doesn't seem to be registered. Best to check with ${process.env.NAME_1} or ${process.env.NAME_2} whether they've updated your email address properly in the system.
en.notAuthorised: You are not authorised to set an RSVP for this user.
en.oddRsvp: You can only pick yes or no for your RSVP
en.saveTheDateBlurb: We'd be honoured to have you join us on ${date_en}. Please put it in your calendar, and fill in the form below so we can make sure you get a proper invitation.
en.shameCantCome: It's a shame you won't be able to make it, but thank you for letting us know!
en.sorryYouCantCome: Sorry you can't make it :( If you change your mind, let us know
en.travelByCarBlurb: There are plenty of places to park at the venue, so driving up is a good option. If you're planning on driving back, obviously please don't drink—if you'd like to drink, please consider taking a taxi, or using a chauffeur service. For Google Maps directions, click the link below. You can also enter the co-ordinates manually into your sat nav: 47.5400, 18.9352
en.travelByPublicTransportBlurb: Public transport is not the perfect way to get to Petneházy as it takes a long time from the city centre. If you would still like to travel by public transport, the best approach is to get either the 56A or the 61 in the direction of Hűvösvölgy from Széll Kálmán tér. From Széll Kálmán tér, you will need two tickets (approx 0.90 GBP each), and you need to validate one on the tram, and another on the bus. Once you arrive at the Hűvösvölgy tram stop, take bus 63 for 5 stops until you get to Adyliget (don't overshoot - your Budapest transport tickets/passes aren't valid beyond Adyliget). From Adyliget bus stop, cross over the road and turn back in the direction the bus came from. Take the first right (opposite the park) onto Feketefej utca. It's about a ten minute walk with a steep uphill section. The venue will be on your left as you approach.
en.travelFromAirportBlurb: From the airport, you can pay for a taxi all the way (which is likely to cost around 40 GBP), or you can take the 100E shuttle bus into Budapest city centre (approx 2.50 GBP per ticket) to Déak Ferenc tér, from where a taxi should be around 15 GBP. If you would prefer, you can also take the metro from Déak Ferenc tér to Széll Kálmán tér, from where you can follow the Public Transport directions above. In total you can expect to pay about 5 GBP to get from the airport to the venue, but it will take you about 2 hours. It might be a better idea to try and find someone to travel with who can share the cost of a taxi with you.
en.whoElse: Who is sitting at my table?

hu.accommodationProvided: Tudjuk, hogy hosszú utad lesz, ezért szeretnénk biztosítani a szállást. Az alábbi linket találsz a szállásról bővebb információt.
hu.browserCopy: Ezt a linket kimásolhatod és beillesztheted a böngésző URL-sávjába is.
hu.canYouJoin: Kérjük jelezd, ha részt tudsz venni a nagy napunkon, ${date_hu}
hu.checkDetails: Íme néhány információ az esküvővel kapcsolatban:
hu.linkForLogIn: Az alábbi linken éred el ${process.env.NAME_1} és ${process.env.NAME_2} esküvői oldalát
hu.linkSent: Elküldtünk egy linket, amivel be tudsz lépni
hu.lookingForward: Örülünk, hogy ott leszel a mi nagy napunkon!
hu.name: Név
hu.orScan: vagy szkenneld be a QR kódot
hu.shameCantCome: Kár, hogy nem tudsz jönni, de köszönjük, hogy előre szóltál.
hu.sorryYouCantCome: Sajnáljuk, hogy nem tudsz jönni, ha változás van, szólj!
